name: Sonic Skate - The Skateboard Game for Skaters
name_original: Sonic Skate - The Skateboard Game for Skaters
description:
Sonic Skate is the ultimate adventure across a vast land. Sonic comes across many unforeseen dangers and enemies as it follows a trail of magical coins and mystical objects that help him along his quest.

Game Feature
- Easy tap and fly motion game
- Endless runner style game with missions, obstacles and tonnes of fun
- Complete 3 Missions at a time
- Collect coins to get powerUps to enhance your game
- Collect coins to enable different player

Help Sonic on this action packed adventure journey. This game is loads of fun. So what are you waiting for. Download and play Sonic Skate, LIVE in the App Store, TODAY!
